snippet.title: Dungeons of Hinterberg Sends You On Vacation to Fight Monsters in the Alps | gamescom 2023
snippet.description:
We’re joined by Microbird Games co-founders, Philipp Seifried and Regina Reisinger, to learn more about new action-adventure RPG, Dungeons of Hinterberg.

Journey to a new tourist hotspot in the breathtaking Austrian Alps and prepare to brave Hinterberg’s magical dungeons, which are filled with monsters and mythical Alpine creatures. Take on these fearsome foes, master magical powers, and solve puzzles when Dungeons of Hinterberg is released in 2024.

#IGN #Gaming
